Description: Type of truck (all will be Snow & Ice)
time logged on the unit for each individual reading - readings happen every minute or if the truck is doing something
location address the truck is closest to
The specific work the truck is doing - if blank then refer to the most recent action the truck took (if the plow was down before it remains down until the activity type says plow up)
longitude at the time of reading - there may be some error
latitude at the time of reading - there may be some error
